MOD = 998244353
(n, k) = map(int, input().split())
arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
pos = [0] * (n + 1)
for i in range(n):
    pos[arr[i]] = i
pos[n] = -1
cnt = 0
for i in range(n - 1):
    if pos[arr[i] + 1] > pos[arr[i + 1] + 1]:
        cnt += 1
(num, denom) = (1, 1)
for i in range(n):
    num = num * (k - cnt + n - 1 - i) % MOD
    denom = denom * (i + 1) % MOD
print(num * pow(denom, MOD - 2, MOD) % MOD)

MOD = 998244353
(n, k) = input().split()
n = int(n)
k = int(k)
suffix_array = input().split()
for i in range(n):
    suffix_array[i] = int(suffix_array[i])
position = [0] * (n + 1)
for i in range(n):
    position[suffix_array[i]] = i
position[n] = -1
count = 0
for i in range(n - 1):
    if position[suffix_array[i] + 1] > position[suffix_array[i + 1] + 1]:
        count += 1
(num, denom) = (1, 1)
for i in range(n):
    num = num * (k - count + n - 1 - i) % MOD
    denom = denom * (i + 1) % MOD
print(num * pow(denom, MOD - 2, MOD) % MOD)
